Message:
After being saved by that healer,
I became her apprentice and
learned healing techniques
of all sorts.

As my master wasn’t a witch,
she couldn’t use magic.

But, when she saved my life,
her warm hands felt
just like magic to me.

I believed this was where
my power as a witch
could finally be of use.

Despite my optimism though,
there were times I felt using
my power was unfair.

I could perform even the most
complex healing techniques
in an instant, while everyone else
had to put in so much work...
But, my master told me this...

“With your magic,
even more people can be saved.
Treasure it dearly, Yuni.”

That’s when I realized...
The person with the most
prejudice against witches
was none other than myself.

Witch or not,
it makes no difference.
I’ll heal everyone with
this power of mine.
